```{r}
#| include: false
library(data.table)
library(purrr)
library(vars)
library(svars)
require(fevdid)
require(ggplot2)
library(vfciBCHelpers)
```

```{r}
bc_freqs <- c(2 * pi / 32, 2 * pi / 6)
lags <- 2

data <- get_var_data(end_date = as.Date("2022-07-01"))
x <- data[, -"vfci"] |> copy()
v <- fit_var(x, lags = lags)

all_variables <- names(x[, -"date"]) |> set_names()

mv_list <- all_variables |>
  map(~ id_linear_het_reg(v, target = .x)) |>
  c(list(max_share_u = id_fevdfd(v, "unemployment", bc_freqs)))

colors <-
  c(
    "#b6848e",
    "#92d34f",
    "#9043da",
    "#d0a54c",
    "#736bb7",
    "#8ad3a7",
    "#c54fa0",
    "#607141",
    "#c44d3f",
    "#71a1b8"
  ) |>
  setNames(all_variables) |>
  c(max_share_u = "black")

```
